catalog_script_client.name: Autofill Manager

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_f00849951bf45d106a08a9b4bd4bcba8
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="WFH Record Producer">c76245111bf45d106a08a9b4bd4bcb57</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:a0f3cd511bf45d106a08a9b4bd4bcbdf</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Autofill Manager</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }

    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
    var theUserFieldIsNowBlank = (g_form.getValue('u_user') == '');

    if (theUserFieldIsNowBlank) {
        g_form.clearValue('u_manager');
        return;
    }

    var gAjax = new GlideAjax('GetUserAJAX');
    g_form.addDecoration('u_manager', 'icon-refreshing');
    gAjax.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getManager');
    gAjax.addParam('sysparm_sys_id', g_form.getValue('u_user'));
    gAjax.getXMLAnswer(thensetManager);

    function thensetManager(response) {
        g_form.setValue('u_manager', response);
        g_form.removeDecoration('u_manager', 'icon-refreshing');
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>David.Admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-19 01:10:22</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f00849951bf45d106a08a9b4bd4bcba8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Autofill Manager</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Working From Home (WFH)" source="x_852034_wfh">ca4c5dfd1ba811106a08a9b4bd4bcb1f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Working From Home (WFH)">ca4c5dfd1ba811106a08a9b4bd4bcb1f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_f00849951bf45d106a08a9b4bd4bcba8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>David.Admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-19 01:10:22</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
